title: cmd/gc: badly formatted complex constant in error string
body:
by **carlchatfield**: 
http://play.golang.org/p/yyBdljcg-I

_ = string(-4 + 2i + 2)

What is the expected output?
cannot convert -2+2i to type string
cannot convert -2+2i (type complex128) to type string

What do you see instead?
cannot convert (-42i) + 2 to type string
cannot convert (-42i) + 2 (type complex128) to type string

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
linux_amd64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.1.2 linux/amd64
